words.source: H6437 (פָּנָה, 'to turn/look'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he looked', ESV 'He looked', NASB 'he looked' — all agree
H3541 (כֹּה, 'thus/here'), HD (adverb); KJV 'this way', ESV 'this way', NASB 'this way' — all agree
H3541 (כֹּה, 'thus/there'), HC/D (conjunctive/adverb); KJV 'and that way', ESV 'and that', NASB 'and that way' — all agree
H7200 (רָאָה, 'to see'), HC/Vqw3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he saw', ESV 'seeing', NASB 'he saw' — all agree
H3588 (כִּי, 'that/because'), HC (conjunction); KJV 'that', ESV 'that', NASB 'that' — all agree
H369 (אַיִן, 'nothing/there is not'), HTn (particle of negation); KJV 'there was no', ESV 'there was no one', NASB 'there was no one' — all agree
H376 (אִישׁ, 'man'), HNcmsa (noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'no man', ESV 'no one', NASB 'no one' — all agree
H5221 (נָכָה, 'to strike/smite'), HC/Vhw3ms (conjunctive/Hiphil-wayyiqtol-3ms); KJV 'he slew', ESV 'he struck down', NASB 'he struck down' — all agree
H4713 (מִצְרִי, 'Egyptian'), HTd/Ngmsa (article/gentilic-noun-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'the Egyptian', ESV 'the Egyptian', NASB 'the Egyptian' — all agree
H2934 (טָמַן, 'to hide/bury'), HC/Vqw3ms/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3ms/suffix-3ms); KJV 'hid him', ESV 'hid him', NASB 'hid him' — all agree
H2344 (חוֹל, 'sand'), HRd/Ncmsa (preposition-with-article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'in the sand', ESV 'in the sand', NASB 'in the sand' — all agree
